sense.gloss: nail (e.g. fingernail, toenail), claw, talon, hoof
toes, tips of the toes, toe of a shoe, sock, etc.
sponge gourd (Luffa aegyptiaca), Egyptian cucumber, Vietnamese luffa, dishrag gourd

r_ele.r: つめでひろってみでこぼす

sense.gloss: scars (e.g. of war), traces (of damage), ravages, after-effects
shunning, ostracism, exclusion, rejection, snub, leaving (someone) out, giving (someone) the cold shoulder
flick (of one's finger; to express disgust, scorn, disapproval, etc.)

r_ele.r: のうあるたかはつめをかくす

sense.gloss: a wise man keeps some of his talents in reserve, one shouldn't show off, the person who knows most often says least, a skilled hawk hides its talons
to strum, to pluck the strings (of a guitar)
to finger, to roll between the thumb and the fingers
spur (of a chicken, pheasant, etc.), cockspur, calcar
cutting a fingernail (or toenail) to the quick, cutting a nail too close
deep-set nail, deep-set part of nail
formal, stiff, pompous, stern, solemn, grave
claws and fangs, claws and tusks
clutches, devious design, means of causing harm, weapon
playing with one's fingers (a guitar, etc.)
clang of hoofs, sound of a koto
extremely spicy form of chili pepper
cheyletid (any mite of the family Cheyletidae)
shred (of decency, etc.), scrap, bit, smidgen

k_ele.e: つめの垢を煎じて飲む
爪のあかを煎じて飲む

r_ele.r: つめのあかをせんじてのむ

sense.gloss: to take a lesson from (someone serving as an example), to learn from someone's example, to boil the dirt under (someone's) fingernails and drink it
lunula (white crescent-shaped area at the base of a nail), nail moon
silvertip shark (Carcharhinus albimarginatus, a requiem shark found throughout the tropical Indian and Pacific Oceans)
uphill path, path or slope that becomes slowly steeper

sdata.j: ↑爪↑↓つめ↓を↑噛↑↓か↓むのはよしなさい。
sdata.e: Don't bite your nails.

sdata.j: その↑鋭↑↓するど↓いかぎ↑爪↑↓つめ↓を↑開↑↓ひら↓いては↑閉↑↓と↓じ、↑開↑↓ひら↓いては↑閉↑↓と↓じ↑始↑↓はじ↓めた。
sdata.e: Its sharp claws began to open and close, open and close.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑爪先↑↓つまさき↓↑立↑↓だ↓ちで↑踊↑↓おど↓れる。
sdata.e: I can dance on my toes.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑夜↑↓よる↓には↑決↑↓けっ↓して↑爪↑↓つめ↓を↑切↑↓き↓らない。
sdata.e: I never cut my nails at night.

sdata.j: ↑親指↑↓おやゆび↓の↑爪↑↓つめ↓をはがしてしまいました。
sdata.e: I had my thumbnail torn off.

sdata.e: The holy man tiptoed his way across the Ganges.

sdata.j: ↑爪先↑↓つまさき↓が↑浮↑↓う↓きたっちゃうよ。
sdata.e: That keeps me on my toes.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑爪↑↓つめ↓を↑噛↑↓か↓む↑癖↑↓くせ↓をやっと↑直↑↓なお↓した。
sdata.e: He managed to cure himself of his habit of nibbling his nails.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑背中↑↓せなか↓を↑掻↑↓か↓いたり、↑爪↑↓つめ↓を↑噛↑↓か↓んだりする↑癖↑↓くせ↓がある。

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑爪↑↓つめ↓を↑噛↑↓か↓む↑癖↑↓くせ↓がある。
sdata.e: She has a habit of biting her nails.

sdata.j: グリーンピースは↑鉄分↑↓てつぶん↓が↑豊富↑↓ほうふ↓で↑爪↑↓つめ↓の↑色↑↓いろ↓がよくなる↑成分↑↓せいぶん↓が↑含↑↓ふく↓まれている。

sdata.j: ↑爪↑↓つめ↓を↑噛↑↓か↓むのはよしなさい。
sdata.e: Stop biting your nails.

sdata.j: ↑親指↑↓おやゆび↓の↑爪↑↓つめ↓をはがしてしまいました。

sdata.j: トムは↑爪↑↓つめ↓を↑噛↑↓か↓む↑癖↑↓くせ↓がある。

sdata.j: ↑能↑↓のう↓ある↑鷹↑↓たか↓は↑爪↑↓つめ↓を↑隠↑↓かく↓す。
sdata.e: A smart falcon hides its talons.

sdata.j: ↑能↑↓のう↓ある↑鷹↑↓たか↓は↑爪↑↓つめ↓を↑隠↑↓かく↓す。
sdata.e: He who knows the most often says the least.

sdata.j: トムは↑爪楊枝↑↓つまようじ↓をくわえていた。

sdata.j: ↑夜↑↓よる↓に↑爪↑↓つめ↓を↑切↑↓き↓るなって、まだそんな↑迷信↑↓めいしん↓を↑信↑↓しん↓じてるの？

sdata.j: ↑強↑↓つよ↓い↑足↑↓あし↓と↑長↑↓なが↓い↑爪↑↓つめ↓のおかげで、クズリは↑簡単↑↓かんたん↓に↑木↑↓き↓に↑登↑↓のぼ↓ることができる。

sdata.j: トムの↑悪↑↓わる↓い↑癖↑↓くせ↓の↑１↑↓ひと↓つは、↑爪↑↓つめ↓を↑噛↑↓か↓むことだね。
